attributes.action: make the police have more power in sanctioning stricter punishments to football players who go to INTENTIONALLY  hurt other players.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: this petition is to give the police greater power in handing out severe punishments to professional football players who in effect 'assault' others by intentionally going out to hurt them. it should be treated as the law . it is the same as assault!
